title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.7 - Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.7 - Insurance

State Regulations

The insurance carrier is to be notified prior to the
acquisition of any building so that coverage, as required by Part 1630 of this

Subchapter, may be obtained. The Bureau of Management is to be notified
immediately of any accident or fire. Fatal or serious personal injuries or
extensive property damage will be reported by telephone or telegram. See also

Part 1631 for requirements on preparation and submission of
reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
